greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = number of odd/even parts >= k in the last section of the set of partitions of n, if k is odd/even.
comment: For the calculation of row n, the number of odd/even parts, etc, take the row n from the triangle A207031 and then follow the same rules of A206563.
formula: It appears that A182703(n,k) = T(n,k) - T(n,k+2). - Omar E. Pol, Feb 26 2012
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Feb 17 2012
